price: 4. o durante un poco más (de la mitad), y recita el Corán despacio (pronunciando cada letra con claridad).
arabic: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: aw zid ʿalayhi warattili al-qur'āna tartīlan
